item.title: CVE-2021-27439|2024-08-03T20:48:17.314Z -- tencentos-tiny -- tencentos-tiny
item.description: TencentOS-tiny version 3.1.0 is vulnerable to integer wrap-around in function 'tos_mmheap_alloc incorrect calculation of effective memory allocation size. This improper memory assignment can lead to arbitrary memory allocation, resulting in unexpected behavior such as a crash or a remote code injection/execution.
